name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wildhero - Greener Way To Do Your Email

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Greener Way To Do Your Email.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HOW IT WORKS
1. Connect your Gmail address
2. Check your emails in Wildhero
3. Plant real trees around the world

Like other email apps, we make money by showing ads. Unlike other apps, we only show ads for ethical brands and use our profits to fund tree-planting projects that restore and protect global biodiversity hotspots!

Our community has planted over 7 million trees, restoring biodiversity hotspots in 10+ countries. Weâ€™re powered by Ecosia, the tree-planting search engine trusted by 20+ million people worldwide.

FUND REAL TREES:
- Ad revenue directly funds our tree-planting projects
- Our ads are for ethical brands only
- Ads are optional, and look just like ads in other email apps. 

OUR PRIVACY PLEDGE
- We never sell, share, or distribute your data
- All ads are non-targeted
- We cannot read your emails

OUR PLANTING APPROACH
- We never plant monocultures - we grow over 500+ native species 
- We plant trees in 10+ countries, protecting global biodiversity hotspots  

JOIN OUR MOVEMENT
Our community is already 450,000 tree-planters strong. Download now and start planting trees today!
